mapper.select: select * from QNA ORDER BY NUM DESC
mapper.insert: insert into QNA(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT) values (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{title},#{contents},#{writer},sysdate,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} where WRITER=#{writer}
mapper.insert: insert into QNA(NUM, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REGDATE, HIT, REF, STEP, DEPTH) values (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{title},#{contents},#{writer},sysdate,0,0,0,0)
